article.title: Poker software - owner license
article.label: License
article.intro: Read more about one-domain license and other options of GS-Poker software licensing
article.description: GS-Poker stand-alone poker server software is provided with one-server or multi-server license.
article.keywords: poker software, online poker software license, online poker server software license, poker software for sale, online poker system, poker client server software

text.p: A purchase of GS-Poker includes a one-domain license. The license allows you to do the following:

ul.li: Distribute client applications on as many domains as you wish
Change your domain name many times
Change the design and brand name of the product
Connect as many players as necessary
Scale-up the server platform (add more servers)

text.p: You are not allowed to do the following:

ul.li: Start more than one copy of the poker server
Resell the software and/or source code

text.p: If you think your company would be better served by a multi-domain license, please contact us.
